Zinzy
About

Objects of inquiry during the Empathize stage of Design thinking, pains and gains are the challenges facing users in their interactions with a product or service, as well as the opportunities product or service makers have to improve these interactions.

Let me know what you think I won't know you've been here unless you tell me. Let me know what you think about this either via email, Mastodon or webmention. I would love to read about your perspective.

This page is part of my digital garden.
